name: Plant Trader
description:
As a merchant of all things green, you grow many different plants in your home and then sell them in time before they rot and make a profit! The more money you make, the more pots you buy for your plants!

Plant Trader is a 2D time-management economical game where you act as a gardener who buys seeds and grows plants, and then, before they rot, has to sell at a bargain price and make a huge fortune, buying even more expensive plants!

Game Features:
- Visual style
- Sales System
- Difficulty
